alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued March 04 at 2:10PM PST until March 05 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the Lake Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Waves 2 to 4 feet. * WHERE...For the Wind Advisory: Western Nevada Basin and Range. For the Lake Wind Advisory: Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 10 PM PST this evening. For the Lake Wind Advisory, from 4 AM to 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust could limit visibility at times. Snow showers will also be possible through afternoon and evening, with greater potential for snow to accumulate after sundown.
info.instruction: Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio furniture, holiday decorations, and trash cans before winds increase which could blow these items away. The best thing to do is prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in the event of a power outage.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
